snippet: The Pistons rebuilding process is going slowly and painfully in a 2-8 start.
abstract: The Pistons rebuilding process is going slowly and painfully in a 2-8 start.
lead_paragraph: Pistons starting small forward Tayshaun Prince has seen just about everything in his nine seasons with the team. He's been part of a championship team in 2004, one that came so close to repeating in 2005, and has made six trips to the Eastern Conference finals.

headline.main: Pistons, Prince Frustrated by Poor Start
